repnme.cdata!:
Mexico - Road Transport and
            Telecommunications Sector Adjustment Loan

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Road Transport and
            Telecommunications Sector Adjustment Loan is to promote
            structural reforms to resume sustainable economic growth.
            The loan supports a program of deregulation in the trucking
            sector, and a program of privatization and regulatory reform
            that will promote competition in the telecommunciations
            sector.  Pricing and taxation distortions in the two sectors
            are being eliminated, and the public sector institutions
            responsible for overseeing the sectors are being
            restructured.  The loan also includes measures to improve
            highway safety, and to monitor compliance by trucks with air
            pollution standards.

docna.cdata!:
Mexico - Road Transport and
            Telecommunications Sector Adjustment Loan

display_title.display_title:
